channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken street bin, litter on the pavement, Jasmine Grove/ Oakfield Road SE20, 5th December
item.description:
Litter bin has fallen off the lamppost, litter is now on the pavement, corner of Jasmine Grove and Oakfield Road SE20 8QT. Problem occurred some time week commencing 1st December 2025

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Opposite Entrance to Unit A Argo House, 5th December
item.description:
Rats have been seen feeding from these items which have been left uncollected now for more than 4 days. The bags have now also been ripped open by foxes and other creatures. Could you please send your colleagues to come and collect these items and kindly also arrange for a reliable street cleaning service for this pavement area which has now become a dumping ground for all sorts of rubbish . Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Breeze blocks & rubbish dumped, 5th December
item.description:
Rubble & breeze blocks & metal dumped on public alley to Curtismill Way blocking alley which is in frequent use. My dad who is 82 & resident near wateringbury clise has to lift his zimmerframe to get past. There are other elderly people who live on n this estate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Saxville Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Laxton Place NW1 3PS, 5th December
item.description:
There are 2 problems here. 1) The traffic sign is tilting at a 30 degree angle 2)The lamppost has been hit by car and is again almost severed at bottom and lies at 30 degree angle but looks as if it could topple over. The concrete at base is broken. Both are very near to big church on Munster Square corner of Laxton Place NW1.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Laxton Place, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
